author: markekraus
body:
closes #5134

* Adds PSTypeName preservation on `Import-Csv` and `ConvertFrom-Csv`

A note for reviewers: the logic for adding the type name was moved to after the object's properties are populated to prevent `Cannot add a member with the name "<PorpertyName>" because a member with that name already exists` errors during object serialization.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT CI Travis don't report status - can PG investigate the issue?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov seems to be an ongoing issue with Travis-CI.  Looking at the actual results, it passed on both macOS and Linux, so we are good.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT It seems I haven't permission to manually merge - (protected branch hook declined). Or I do something wrong.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT It seems the problem with CI Travis coming from #5249

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @markekraus can you rebase and pick up #5249?

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT *shrugs. Rebased and the Travis CI tests passed, but they still are not updating the PR to reflect that.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Merging with macOS still not finished.  Talked to other maintainers and we think the risk is low.

title: Add PSTypeName Support for Import-Csv and ConvertFrom-Csv
